attributes.action: Discuss the use of medical cannabis for motor neurone disease
attributes.additional_details:
Motor neurone disease is a deadly , painful disease with no treatment available .
Medical cannabis controls the pain , helps with sleep , and there is currently investigation suggesting that can delay incapacity and death 
Medical cannabis is already prescribed to diseases of the same family , why not this one ?
attributes.background: To allow prescription of medical cannabis to patients diagnosed with motor neurone disease

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to prescribe 'medical cannabis' are a matter for individual clinicians, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about when 'medical cannabis' is likely to be prescribed here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/medical-cannabis/
